attributes.action: Wiggins in the Tour De France
attributes.additional_details: It is a travesty that Sir Bradley Marc Wiggins will not be competing in the 2014 Tour De France. Wiggins should be given the opportunity to ride in front of his home nation and compete for the Tour De France win as a matter of national interest. It is like leaving Steven Gerrard out of the England team.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Sky Pro Cycling.
